product_name: Sherpani Verve Large Messenger Bag - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With lots of pockets and dedicated places for all your daily essentials, the slender Sherpani Verve messenger bag is sure to appeal to your organizational side. Deep main pocket has a large opening for easy access and a panel divider to separate items; expandable closure accommodates various load sizes. Floral-pattern lining accents the Verve's interior; includes organizational pockets and 2 pen holders. Front exterior includes 2 drop-in pockets and 2 zippered pockets located underneath the exterior flap; mesh water bottle pocket on one end. Luggage pass-through allows you to attach Verve Messenger on your rolling luggage pull handle; doubles as a pocket. Adjustable shoulder strap with shoulder pad; front flap also features magnetic closure buttons and a small zip security pocket. Recycled polyester stands up to abrasions, tears and punctures; dyes are nontoxic. Closeout.
short_description: With lots of pockets and dedicated places for all your daily essentials, the slender Sherpani Verve messenger bag is sure to appeal to your organizational side.
